meanings.definition: To surpass in adding or combining.
meanings.sent1: She always outadds her friends when solving math problems.
meanings.sent2: The chef outadds extra spices to make the dish more flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The race car driver outadds speed to his car by upgrading the engine.
meanings.sent4: The artist outadds colors to create a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The student outadds knowledge by reading books on various subjects.

meanings.definition: The act of adding more than something else.
meanings.sent1: His outadding of toppings on the pizza made it delicious.
meanings.sent2: The outadding of decorations to the room made it festive.
meanings.sent3: The outadding of jokes to the speech made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The outadding of layers to the cake made it tall and impressive.
meanings.sent5: Her outadding of accessories to the outfit made it stylish and unique.
